items.sentence: Maybe this isn\'t the right place to do this.
My brother says he isn\'t afraid of the dark.
It took me three hours to finish my homework.
Tom is coming here this afternoon, isn\'t he?
Tom knows Mary can\'t speak French very well.
Tom is carrying a duffel bag on his shoulder.
Tom is coming over Monday evening for dinner.
Did you try playing that song on your guitar?
Tom complained about having to stand in line.
She has known him since they were very young.
That\'s the most important thing to remember.
Tom and his father are building a tree house.
She asked him if he knew my telephone number.
There used to be a small castle on this hill.
Tom might be able to do that, but I doubt it.
Tom must be busier now than he was last year.
Tom never told me that you were so beautiful.
I didn\'t know Tom was younger than you were.
I didn\'t know that Tom was going to do that.
I didn\'t know that Tom was younger than you.
